New: Calendars, Cards and Gifts!
• Introducing Wall Calendars on the app! A year’s worth of memories in just a few taps.
• Our new 2017 Holiday Cards collection is now available on the app.
• Holiday gifting made easy with new glitter ornaments, beer steins, latte mugs, and much more!

We’re always happy to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out with any question, suggestion or concern at: mobilesupport@shutterfly.com.

INTRODUCING: OUR NEW KIDS AND PETS COLLECTION!

SHUTTERFLY KIDS COLLECTION
All new designs and products just for kids! Get backpacks, folders, pencil cases, notebooks, bean bags, & so much more. Plus, products for kids are 100% customizable, so your designs can be as unique as your little ones.

SHUTTERFLY PETS COLLECTION
Shop playful pet gear for dogs and cats! Personalize pet accessories like bandanas or pet tags, and make sure your furry friend is comfy-cozy with a one-of-a-kind pet bed.

NEW: FREE BOOK A MONTH!
App Exclusive
Capture everyday fun with a FREE 6x6 softcover photo book every month! It’s quick and easy to pop your pics into a book that shares all of life’s little stories. Includes up to 40 pages free, plus no subscriptions. Just pay shipping. Exclusively on the Shutterfly app!

NEW FEATURE!
Searching for something in particular? You can now search for specific products simply by typing a name or description.

We’re always happy to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out with any question, suggestion or concern at: mobilesupport@shutterfly.com
